session_info.name: MOPATH - Plenary Session 1: ERL's Around the Globe

papers.title: ERL-based Electron-Ion Colliders
institutions: Two of future proposed electron-ion colliders are based on ERL-technology: LHeC at CERN and eRHIC at BNL. The talk covers technological aspects of using recirculating ERLs to deliver high current-high energy electron beam for EIC experiments and related challenges.

papers.title: Energy Recovery Linacs : Past, Present and Future
authors: Cornell Laboratory for Accelerator-Based Sciences and Education
papers.abstract: The initial presentation of the idea will be shown as well as the first demonstrations of the principle and contemporary systems. Concepts for the future will be presented and challenges to their realization discussed including R&D needs.
